Watson-Html
===========

Utility methods for dealing with HTML.

For full documentation please see `Read The
Docs <http://watson-html.readthedocs.org/>`__.

Build Status
^^^^^^^^^^^^

|Build Status| |Coverage Status| |Version|

Installation
------------

``pip install watson-html``

Dependencies
------------
